description: A modern direction with the kitchen well in view, even from the outside, just a short walk from Porta Romana, in a district buzzing with pubs and restaurants. The engaging initiative of bringing the menus written in the chef’s hand enhances the artisanal work and allows explaining the various dishes in person. This is the cuisine of Luca Natalini, a real Tuscan who loves illustrating his region and the produce he knows best: charcoal-grilled whole pigeon served with an offal tartlet is an excellent example of his culinary skill. A bright room at the entrance and a more private space at the back.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Diners Club credit card', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
